comments.author: k0scist@gmail.com
comments.text: When entering a new bugzilla comment, it would be nice (maybe optionally with a preference) to be redirected to the specific url of the comment (e.g. show_bug.cgi?id=123456#c13). This lets me be near the comments' end, which will let me read and reply to more comments near where i'm working in addition to providing a URL to the comment i can copy+paste
